name: Audiomack
author: Audiomack.com

sections.description:
Audiomack is the place for artists to effortlessly share their music and for fans to discover and download free songs and albums.

With this plugin all you need to do is click on the sound icon in edit page/post screen and then paste the web link to a song or album.
This plugin will generate the necessary embed codes.

Demo

Author

For more information visit Audiomack.com
sections.installation:
Automatic Install

Please go to WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New Plugin > Search for: audiomack and then press install

Manual Installation

  1. Upload audiomack.zip into to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Run into issues or have questions/suggestions?

If you have suggestions or run into an issue please email us at support@audiomack.com

  • Fixed a little glitch from 1.2.1 … wasn’t preselecting the thin value from the options.

1.2.1

  • Tested with WP 4.2
  • Deactivated color pickers for now and no custom colors are passed to the embed end point.
  • Added Player Style property which can be: thin, standard and large (default).
  • Users who have used the old slim option in the past will be converted to Player Style ‘thin’
  • Pushed the version to 1.2.1

  • Tested with WP 4.1
  • Added some UTM params in the settings link.
  • Added social media in the setting’s sidebar. Twitter follow + Facebook page

  • Updated the settings page so it uses 2 columns and it is better organized.
  • Updated screenshot 1
  • Removed the text help us get on WordPress.com (the plugin is now used there)
  • Tested with WP 4.0

  • Removed text: Help us put Audiomack on WordPress.com from readme

  • Improved the UI of the shortcode generator

  • Deleted some old QR code files that were used for other purpose

1.1.1

  • Added a color picker to make selecting colors easier.

1.1.0

  • Added a search tab in the Audiomack’s icon
  • Made album player height 352px
  • Fixes and other improvements
  • Tested with WP 3.6.1

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Audiomack plugin allows you to add the audio player from Audiomack.com into your WordPress site using shortcodes.
